content:
StateChangeKind StateChangeKind Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.dll

Represents kind of state change for an actor state when SaveStateAsync(ActorId, IReadOnlyCollection<ActorStateChange>, CancellationToken) saves changes to a set of actor states.

Edit

In this Article

public enum StateChangeKindPublic Enum StateChangeKind

Fields

Add Add

The state needs to be added.
None None

No change in state
Remove Remove

The state needs to be removed.
Update Update

The state needs to be updated.
